backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling authorization, user profiles, and CRUD operations for accounts, categories, transactions, and budgets.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading legacy state to include empty budgets and a new budget ID counter.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to implemented budget-related features with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router, authentication gating, theming, and route definitions including budgets.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wrapper that loads the user profile, shows the setup dialog when needed, and gates app rendering during loading.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login page using Internet Identity with UI for sign‑in, loading state, and error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for collecting and saving the user’s display name during first‑time setup.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Catego: Computes expense totals per category and renders a bar-style breakdown chart with percentages.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/QuickS: Calculates income, expenses, and net amount and displays them as three stat cards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TopCat: Determines the top five expense categories and shows their totals and percentage of overall spending.
Provides the main app layout with navigation, header, user menu, and routing-aware active states.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Modal form for creating a transaction with validation and integration with account and category data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useFinanceQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating accounts, categories, transactions, budgets, and user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global styling.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides currency and date formatting utilities, using stored user settings when available.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single account’s details and transactions with options to add new transactions.
frontend/src/pages/AccountsPage.tsx: Shows a list of accounts, total balance, and a dialog for creating new accounts.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetsPage.tsx: Manages monthly budgets, category limits, and spending calculations with editing support.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays categories, date‑range totals, and a dialog to create new categories using finance query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows financial overview with charts and stats, fetching transactions, accounts, and categories by date range.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Manages user settings like currency, persisting them per‑identity in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Lists transactions with search and filters, and provides a dialog for creating new transactions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading/storing URL parameters and syncing them with sessionStorage, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and layout utilities with custom theme variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, modular architecture notes, and known build issues for a Firefly 3-like finance app.
